title: Executive Order 5383-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments of Red Lake Indians, Minnesota
content: It is hereby ordered under authority contained in section 5 of the act of February 8, 1887 (24 Stat. 389-390), that the trust period on the allotments of the following named members of the Red Lake Chippewa Tribe of Indians of Minnesota, on the ceded part of the Red Lake Reservation, be, and is hereby, extended for a period of 10 years from the date of expiration.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5383-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments of Red Lake Indians, Minnesota Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/276889
